code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import Login from'./Login';import Register from'./Register';import UserDashboard from'./UserDashboard';import AdminDashboard from'./AdminDashboard';import api from'./api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState('login');const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const handleLoginSuccess=userData=>{setUser(userData);setCurrentPage(userData.is_staff?'admin':'user');};const handleNavigate=page=>{setCurrentPage(page);};const handleLogout=async()=>{try{await api.post('/logout/');}catch(err){console.error('Logout error:',err);}finally{localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('username');localStorage.removeItem('is_staff');localStorage.removeItem('user_id');setUser(null);setCurrentPage('login');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"nav-brand",children:"Bus Ticket System"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-user",children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-logout",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]})}),!user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[currentPage==='login'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLoginSuccess:handleLoginSuccess,onNavigate:handleNavigate}),currentPage==='register'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{onNavigate:handleNavigate})]}):user.is_staff?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDashboard,{user:user}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserDashboard,{user:user})]});}export default App;
